tagline: Compress images with smart optimization for web and mobile
pageDescription: Professional image optimization tool that reduces file size by up to 80% while maintaining visual quality. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, and AVIF formats with adjustable compression levels. Perfect for web developers optimizing page speed and mobile app developers reducing bundle size. Batch process multiple images with real-time preview.
